1576002321_17ZnSRGrALWLigjaDhkzUM4KAC8c8.body:
There are so many red flags... I would avoid it...
* Super Hype
* Cryptocurrency Based
* Unsubstantiated Claims
* Closed Source
* No Open Audit

1585516116_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdo.body: Similar story here... operate from home, keep calm, we just got our first ground turkey so it looks like at least some of the panic buying is slowing down, but judging from what I saw yesterday the majority of the population has no idea what shelter in place means or social distancing...
